definition: the property of a more than adequate quantity or supply
details:
noun
- the property of a more than adequate quantity or supply
= example: the property of a more than adequate quantity or supply
= synonyms: copiousness, teemingness
- (chemistry) the ratio of the total mass of an element in the earth's crust to the total mass of the earth's crust
- (physics) the ratio of the number of atoms of a specific isotope of an element to the total number of isotopes present
